@Horndoggo I'll pass you some numbers, since searching for the name of the artists can be unreliable here. I'll also put a description of what they usually make in general. Satomi (316242), mostly Naruto stuff, fully vanilla. Kirin Kakeru (222149), mostly idolmaster and/or yandere. Tukinowagamo (206409), pure vanilla. Simon (339315), pure vanilla recently. Aoin (352533), only parodies, but it's Aoin ffs. You probably saw this in the popular section already. Gesundheit (249452), not very vanilla, but no NTR either. One of my favorite artists of all time. Sasamori Tomoe (224921), a classic, but for a reason. Now, not all of these are going to blow your mind, but all of them have better art than 99% of the NTR out there. I left out a few and tried to stay close to vanilla, and I also forgot some, but I think this is a decent list. Also limited characters per comment.

@RUD3DUD3 It's "Sex in young adult relationships". They didn't need to have sex. Just need some paper work and they're done. Health education subject in school love this kind of topic (at least in my country).

Herio is just one of many artists that completely disprove the weird notion that NTR has the best art. You'll find both good and bad art in every genre. There's no such thing as "[insert genre] always has good art!" That being said, it's both funny and sad how every vanilla comment section has people talking about how the girl will get stolen at some point. This NTR craze is such a disease that it completely broke a lot of people who would normally just enjoy the wholesome story. Relax, guys. There is no NTR here. Go fetch some snacks or order a pizza. Treat yourself today. You'll get through this.
